text: In macrophages and other types of cells , LPS activates three subclasses of MAPKs : extracellular signal - regulated kinase ( ERK ) , c - Jun - terminal kinase ( JNK ) and p38 . Studies have revealed that some compounds are able to suppress proinflammatory cytokines and NF - κB , to inhibit the COX - 2 and iNOS expression inhibiting some of these MAPKS [ 129 ] [ 130 ] [ 131 ] .
